page.title: 05A DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: On{Wednesdays}when I come to{school I sometimes play in the{playground and I sometimes stand under the shelter.The{bell}goes at{9.00 o'clock and we go in and hang up our coats and change our shoes.We{read}for about 20 minutes and then we do{maths}until 10 past 10 when the bell goes for us to go to{hall}for Assembly.That lasts for 30 minutes,then we play out for 15 minutes.Sometimes I feed the{gerbils}during playtime.After {playtime}Graham and Patrick go for a {violin}lesson and the rest of us do writing until{dinner}time.Leonie and I have a violin lesson before we eat our packed lunches,then we go out to play.In the afternoon we do our {topic work}until 2.15pm then we go out to play.After play we have games until {hometime}at 3.30 pm. By{Tina Sutcilffe
